debian9-hw.boot_args: root=ram console=tty0 console=ttyS1,115200n8 rootfstype=ramdisk verbose udev.children-max=2 machine-id reset.journal simplenet=1 rootauthorizedkeys=__servers.config__/keys/authorized_keys runscript=__servers.config__/postboot/postboot.sh

ubuntu18.04-hw.boot_args: root=ram console=tty0 console=ttyS1,115200n8 rootfstype=ramdisk verbose udev.children-max=2 machine-id reset.journal simplenet=1 rootauthorizedkeys=__servers.config__/keys/authorized_keys runscript=__servers.config__/postboot/postboot.sh

centos7-hw.boot_args: root=ram console=tty0 console=ttyS1,115200n8 rootfstype=ramdisk verbose udev.children-max=1 machine-id reset.journal simplenet=1 rootauthorizedkeys=__servers.config__/keys/authorized_keys runscript=__servers.config__/postboot/postboot.sh rd.break=mount
